nodes.text: Kor Bareesh was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. It was the ruined throneworld of the Bareesh kajidic.

Kor Bareesh was the throneworld of the Bareesh kajidic, a formerly powerful Hutt clan. However, at some point, Kor Bareesh was devastated by the eruption of a massive supervolcano, which covered much of the planet's main continent with ash and lava.

The eruption buried or destroyed the clan's vaults, and also killed a number of influential clan leaders. The Bareesh still retained their ancient holdings on Nar Shaddaa and Nal Hutta, but enemy clans took advantage of the chaos to take control of their operations and holdings elsewhere. As a result, the Hutts of Bareesh saw their strength greatly diminish over the next centuries and struggled to remain profitable.

During the Galactic Civil War, Tragtath the Hutt led regular expeditions to recover lost artifacts and treasures in the buried vaults of Kor Bareesh. These expeditions were manned by hundreds of slaves and hired experts. However, most of them failed due to the harsh conditions on the ruined planet.
